content.title: Supine Spinal Twist Yoga Pose Instructions

items: Lie down on your back with your arms extended out to the sides, palms facing down.
Bend your knees and bring your feet flat on the floor, hip-width apart.
Exhale and drop both knees to the right side of your body, keeping them bent.
Place your left hand on your right knee and gaze towards your left hand.
Hold the pose for 5-10 deep breaths.
Inhale and bring your knees back to center.
Exhale and drop both knees to the left side of your body, keeping them bent.
Place your right hand on your left knee and gaze towards your right hand.
Hold the pose for 5-10 deep breaths.
Inhale and bring your knees back to center.
Exhale and release your arms to your sides.
Rest in Savasana (Corpse Pose) for a few breaths before sitting up.
